info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 12:53PM EST until February 19 at 1:15PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EST FOR SCHENECTADY...NORTHERN ALBANY AND SOUTHEASTERN SARATOGA COUNTIES... At 1253 PM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Greenwich to near Mechanicville to near Rotterdam, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar and webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 24 and 25. Interstate 90 between exits 25 and 26. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 4 and 7, and between exits 8A and 13N. Interstate 787 between exits 8 and 9. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Saratoga Springs, Cohoes, Watervliet, Colonie, Scotia, Mechanicville, Latham, Niskayuna, Duanesburg, Ballston Spa, Green Island, Waterford, Altamont, Round Lake, Delanson, Rotterdam Junction and East Glenville. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions. Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
